text: Her Only Way is a 1918 silent film drama directed by Sidney Franklin with Norma Talmadge as the star.Her Only Way at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films:..Her Only Way ==Plot== ==Cast== *Norma Talmadge - Lucille Westbrook *Eugene O'Brien - Joseph Marshall *Ramsey Wallace - Paul Belmont *E. Alyn Warren - Judge Hampton Bates *Jobyna Howland - Mrs. Randolph ==Preservation status== *The film is currently lost.
